title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing many ants in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about many ants: Ants are insects that always live in groups and work cooperatively. God has singled them out in His Holy Book in the story of Solomon and the ant. So what does it mean to see a lot of ants in a dream? The answer to this question depends on several factors, including the size and color of the ants. Are ants black, red, or white, and based on that, we find hundreds of different clues to interpret the dream of many ants, which we will learn about in this article. Interpretation of the dream of many antsIn interpreting the dream of ants, jurists provide many different clues, such as: If the dreamer sees many Ants running from their house, this is a sign of a thief or thieves entering the house. As for seeing many ants carrying food and walking in a line outside the house, it can be interpreted as poverty. Getting rid of a lot of ants in the house and killing them in a dream A vision that can warn the dreamer From a chronic illness or the death of a family member. Many red ants in a married woman’s dream indicate the need to take care of her children and monitor her behavior at this critical age. Al-Nabulsi continues to interpret seeing many ants in a dream as evidence of the dreamer’s long life, coverage, and health. Interpretation of a dream of many From ants by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation of the dream of ants many positive and negative connotations, such as: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of many flying ants in a dream as evidence of travel and exile to collect money. If a married woman sees termites walking on the bodies of her children, this is clear evidence of They feel jealous. Ibn Sirin warns the dreamer who has enemies not to see a lot of ants, as this indicates the gathering of enemies, but they are weak, and yet he must be careful. Ibn Sirin mentions the story of King Solomon and says that whoever hears the sound of a group of ants in his dream will assume power and become Among the important ones.Interpretation of a dream about many ants by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen agrees with Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream about many ants and believes that it carries positive and negative interpretations: An unemployed young man who is looking for work, if he sees many ants in his food and eating, he will find a suitable job. Seeing many Of ants in a farmer’s dream is a sign of prosperity in agriculture, increased yields, and then abundant production. Ibn Shaheen warns against seeing a lot of red ants, as this may be a sign of the spread of diseases and epidemics. Interpretation of a dream of a lot of ants for a single woman. Scientists do not praise seeing a lot of ants. In one dream, as we see in their interpretations: It is said that the interpretation of a dream of many ants for single women indicates that they spend money on clothes and personal cosmetics. If a girl sees a lot of ants walking in her hair, this indicates her feeling of emotional emptiness and constantly thinking about marriage. Interpretation A dream about black ants stinging for a single woman. A black ant sting in a dream can be beneficial for an unmarried woman: Interpretation of a dream that black ants sting an unmarried woman in her dream is good news for recovery if she is sick. Black ants sting in a dream

title: Created by the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace

preview.html: And about his life, his message, how he adapted, and how we can imitate him as the best creation of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. He was created by the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Through the elements that we will mention below, it becomes clear to us the most important topics that we will address in our topic about the Messenger of God and the righteous teacher of people, Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, Such as: Introduction to the subject of the expression of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. His birth and lineage, may God bless him and grant him peace. His life before the resurrection. Shipping and shipping. His morale, may God bless him and grant him peace. Conclusion to the subject of the creation of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. See also: The subject of an expression of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Short introduction. The best of what We can open our topic about the Messenger and the righteous teacher of the people, Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, with what God Almighty said about the Messenger in Surah Al-Fath, verse twenty-nine: “Muhammad is the Messenger of God, and those who are with him are harsh with the disbelievers and have mercy on one another.” This verse is the summary of the message of the Noble Messenger Muhammad. May God bless him and grant him peace to believers and polytheists alike. His birth and lineage, may God bless him and grant him peace. Before we talk about the birth and life of the Messenger, something must be emphasized. Which is that Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, was human like us and the rest of creation, and this was confirmed by the noble verse in Surah Al-Kahf, which is “I am but one and this has been revealed to me. Your God is one God,” this verse also emphasized a recognized fact. And that the Messenger of God is a man like all other human beings, and the only difference between us and him is that he is inspired by God Almighty. The Arabs before Islam lived in the simplest form of society, which is the image of warring tribes. This means that The Arabs were divided into tribes. But these tribes did not live in peace, but always had disputes among themselves over the simplest and weakest things. The simplest example that can illustrate the small and hostile size of Arab life before Islam is the Basus War, which lasted about forty years and resulted from a wound in the The side of a camel. The dominant characteristic of the Arabs was the spread of alcohol, so most Arabs were drunk all the time. The Arabs remained in this state for many years in darkness and frowning until the Holy Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, came with his message. Mustafa Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, was born in The Year of the Elephant, that is, the year in which the famous elephant incident occurred when Abraha al-Habashi attacked the Kaaba. He was born on the twelfth day of Rabi’ al-Awwal and his mother was from Banu al-Najjar. A woman named Amina bint Wahb. His father was from Banu Hashim and Abdullah bin al-Muttalib bin Hashim. Thus he was born to parents from Children of Quraysh. Read also: The issue of creation under the authority of the Prophet Muhammad, the Messenger of God. His life before the Resurrection. The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, was an orphan as his father died of a fever during a commercial trip even before his birth. Therefore, the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, lived with his mother and in the care of his grandfather Abdul Muttalib. Therefore Our Master Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, was sent to an Arab nurse, and this was among the customs of the Arabs. The reason was to strengthen the child when a woman breastfed him in the desert. The Prophet’s nurse was the best, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, Mrs. Halima Al-Saadia. At that time, our Master Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, grew up and lived Even a

Therefore Our Master Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, was sent to an Arab nurse, and this was among the customs of the Arabs. The reason was to strengthen the child when a woman breastfed him in the desert. The Prophet’s nurse was the best, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, Mrs. Halima Al-Saadia. At that time, our Master Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, grew up and lived Even a

title: Interpretation of seeing abdominal pressure in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pressure on the abdomen in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. The abdomen is located between the chest and the pelvic area. The abdomen contains most of the tubular organs of the digestive system, and today through this article we will present it to you. Interpretation of seeing pressure in the abdomen in a dream. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Interpretation of seeing pressure in the abdomen in a dream. Abdominal pressure in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve All his goals and ambitions in life. Seeing a man pressing on his stomach in a dream indicates that there will be a relationship of exchange of benefits and money between the fortuneteller and this person. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream someone pressing on her stomach, this indicates that she will soon undergo childbirth, and God knows best. See Also interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a stomach in a dream. Interpretation of the stomach in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the stomach in a dream. It indicates many good and abundant blessings for the fortuneteller. The stomach is folded in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller will be exposed to major financial problems in the coming period. Seeing a large belly in a dream indicates that The fortune teller is an honest man and does not talk about any secrets told to him. Seeing a deviation in the abdomen in a dream indicates the revelation of a great secret to the forerunner, and God knows best. Dreaming of walking on the stomach It indicates that there is someone near the monarch who extends his hand when he needs it. See also the explanation: Interpretation of seeing a large belly In a dream, the interpretation of seeing the abdomen in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained that he sees the abdomen in its natural form in a dream, and it indicates the longevity of the dreamer and his good health, and God knows best. The dream of walking on the stomach, it indicates that the dreamer will suffer great material losses in the near future. Abdominal swelling in the dream states that God will He has a great status and a prominent position in society. Interpretation of seeing the stomach in a dream for a single woman. A big belly in a dream for a single woman. It indicates that you will achieve great success and success in your career. Abdominal bloating in a dream for a single woman. It seems that he will hear a lot of good news in the next few days. Abdominal bloating Severe in a woman’s sleep indicates that he will get engaged soon. Seeing a single woman suffering from stomach pain in a dream shows that she will go through a difficult period full of problems and obstacles in her life. See also the explanation: Interpretation of seeing in a dream a pregnant woman you know or a stranger. Interpretation of seeing the stomach in a dream for a married woman. An empty stomach in a dream. For a married woman, it says that the coming period of her life will be stable and calm. A married woman sees her husband opening her stomach in a dream, which indicates that she will be pregnant soon, and God knows best. Abdominal pain in a dream for a married woman, shows that she will be deceived by someone she loves. Seeing a married woman with a strangely large stomach in The dream says that her husband is taking haraam money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the stomach in a dream for a pregnant woman. Abdominal swelling in a pregnant woman’s dream, and it confirms that she and her fetus are in good health after giving birth, and God knows best. A large belly in a dream for a pregnant woman, which indicates that she will give birth to a boy.

title: The interpretation of seeing a white rat in a dream has many different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream has many different interpretations. The mouse is a rodent that annoys and frightens everyone, especially since it can transmit many serious diseases to humans due to the unclean and highly polluted places in which the mouse is found. He lives, so seeing him in a dream is one of the dreams that you feel. You are together, the interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream has many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a white mouse in a dream When the dreamer sees that a white mouse is chasing him or chasing him in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will find someone close to him trying to chase him. Also, when the dreamer sees that a white rat is standing in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will be harmed or harmed by a friend. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black mouse in a dream When the dreamer sees a black rat in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer He will witness the spread of moral and social epidemics in his city. Also, when the dreamer sees a black rat in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness the spread of sects or lie to him. • When the dreamer sees a black rat in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be surrounded by a large number of wrong ideas. Also, when the dreamer sees a black rat in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness the spread of immorality and debauchery among members of the society in which he lives. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gray mouse in a dream When the dreamer sees a mouse and its color is gray in the dream, it may indicate This means that the dreamer will suffer a financial loss at work. Also, when the dreamer sees a mouse and its color is gray in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will leave his job or harm his source of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead mouse in a dream When the dreamer sees a dead mouse in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer The dream will bring a positive change in his life in the coming period. Also, when the dreamer sees a dead mouse in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will overcome the obstacles that were in his way. • When you see a dead mouse in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will pave his way to achievement and success. Also, when the dreamer sees a mouse die in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will bring goodness to him in his next life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a mouse hunting in a dream When the dreamer sees that he is chasing a mouse in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer He must be careful not to fall into a trap or a conspiracy against him. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is chasing a mouse in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be deceived and betrayed by the order of people close to him. When the dreamer sees a mouse biting his food in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a woman. In his life you will seek to harm him. Also, when the dreamer sees that a mouse is biting his food in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be surrounded by people who indulge in...

title: Interpretation of pajamas in a dream: Wearing pajamas in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of pajamas, for single women, for married women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether it is a gift of pajamas, buying white, pink, black, red, new, old, wide, narrow, long, short, entering a clothing store according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of pajamas in a dream. Interpreter of the world of Nabulsi’s vision. Pajamas in a dream represent the arrival of good news and happy occasions for those who see them, and it is said that it is a new beginning at work or study. Luxurious pajamas in dreams symbolize a high status, ample living, and an increase in money, and it is said that it is the marriage of a young man or girl. Old torn pajamas in a dream symbolize Worries, judgments, and pain for those who see it. Interpretation of buying pajamas in a dream. The meanings of pajamas in a dream refer to a number of interpretations, including buying new pajamas, which indicates the arrival of happy news and occasions. It was also said that it brings goodness and happiness to the home and family, and it also symbolizes good news of birth. Interpretation of buying old pajamas in a dream. Meanings Buying old pajamas in dreams symbolizes the return of an absence or reconciliation between two quarrels, and it is said to be the return of an old relationship to whoever sees it. Dreaming of buying old, dirty pajamas symbolizes crises, difficulties, distress, and heavy debt, and it is said to be an illness to whoever sees it. Interpretation of pajamas in a dream for a manWho dreams of pajamas indicates It indicates an increase in nutrition and kindness, and it is said that it is family and children for those who see them. Whoever sees himself wearing new pajamas in a dream indicates progress in work, kindness, and livelihood for those who see him, and they also said that it is a marriage for young people. Whoever sees himself wearing dirty pajamas in a dream means that he will go through crises and disputes. In life for whoever sees it. Interpretation of pajamas in a dream for a married woman. Anyone who sees pajamas in dreams indicates ample living and an increase in kindness and money in the home and family for whomever sees them. Anyone who sees himself wearing beautiful pajamas in a dream indicates happiness and stability at home with the husband and family, and indicates Also to the kindness of children to whoever sees it. Anyone wearing torn pajamas in a dream indicates a lack of kindness, anxiety and disagreements between the couple you see. Interpretation of pajamas in one dream Most dream interpreters tell us that seeing pajamas in an unmarried girl’s dream is a clear omen of the approaching engagement and marriage of that girl When a girl buys new pajamas in her dream, this vision indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. If an unmarried girl gets rid of her pajamas and does not want to wear them, this may indicate her rejection of the groom who proposed to her. Interpretation of pajamas in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a woman A pregnant woman who dreams of pajamas indicates an easy birth. If a pregnant woman buys pajamas in her dream, this is evidence that she will give birth to a baby girl, and only God knows what is in the womb. But if you see dirty and unclean pajamas in a pregnant woman’s dream, this may be a sign that this woman will suffer. Of some problems during childbirth.

Anyone who sees himself wearing beautiful pajamas in a dream indicates happiness and stability at home with the husband and family, and indicates Also to the kindness of children to whoever sees it. Anyone wearing torn pajamas in a dream indicates a lack of kindness, anxiety and disagreements between the couple you see. Interpretation of pajamas in one dream Most dream interpreters tell us that seeing pajamas in an unmarried girl’s dream is a clear omen of the approaching engagement and marriage of that girl When a girl buys new pajamas in her dream, this vision indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. If an unmarried girl gets rid of her pajamas and does not want to wear them, this may indicate her rejection of the groom who proposed to her. Interpretation of pajamas in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a woman A pregnant woman who dreams of pajamas indicates an easy birth. If a pregnant woman buys pajamas in her dream, this is evidence that she will give birth to a baby girl, and only God knows what is in the womb. But if you see dirty and unclean pajamas in a pregnant woman’s dream, this may be a sign that this woman will suffer. Of some problems during childbirth.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child shaving in a dream

As the meanings of each vision differ depending on the factors, things that must be taken into consideration, and what was mentioned. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a child’s hair cut, according to the most famous translators. There are many indications that we mention in the article. Interpretation of the dream of cutting a child by Ibn Sirin. People sometimes resort to cutting and shaving their hair to get rid of unnecessary hair or to highlight the beauty of the face and add elegance. And organization refers to the external appearance, but what? Interpretation of the dream of seeing a child’s haircut by Ibn Sirin, and here are the repercussions of that in the following lines: When one dreams of shaving a child’s hair, this is a sign of turmoil in the dreamer’s life. This includes both social life and physical fitness. But things It will change for the better. Also, seeing a child being shaved for a married woman who has never been pregnant, is good news of pregnancy soon and the birth of a good and righteous child. While shaving a young girl’s hair is evidence of bad things happening in the visionary’s life. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her young child’s hair, this means that she will give birth to a male child who in the future will be of good morals and loved by people. While seeing a woman An unmarried woman cuts her hair in her dream, as this indicates her ability to build a complete family and will be able to take good care of it. Perhaps the vision indicates that the unmarried girl will be busy in the coming period preparing matters related to marriage. In addition, cutting children’s hair heralds a happy life that Unmarried women wait after marriage. While seeing the hair of a small child in a dream for a man burdened with worries and burdens indicates his ability to complete what he started and he will succeed soon. But cutting a child’s hair in a dream, as this hair looked good, and after cutting it it began to fall out, and the hair The dreamer felt sorry for him. title: Interpretation of a dream about dates by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about dating in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Individuals see many dreams during sleep, and they are of different types and forms, some of which are in the form of food, drink, events, crying, and many others, and we discover that both of them The vision and the dream differ from one person to another according to the psychological state of the fortuneteller, which may differ from one interpreter to another, and in In our article, we will shed light on the interpretation of a dream about dating a son in a dream. Shaheen, and we will explain the interpretation of the dream of dating in a dream in detail for both men, young men, and married or single women. Interpretation of the dream of dates in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen is considered one of the respected interpretation scholars, and is known for interpreting dreams and visions. We find that he interpreted the dream of dates in a dream, and this we mention in the following lines, which is the interpretation. . From a dream about dates in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen explained that if a person sees that he is collecting date seeds in a dream, then this vision indicates the gathering of children from his family, as well as teaching them. But if he sees that he is making a rosary from date pits, then this vision indicates teaching the children. Males only. While whoever sees in his dream that he is eating good dates, this is evidence of thrift and abundance, God willing. We find that it tends to be interpreted that seeing dates scattered in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon travel to another country, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Moreover, When a person dreams that he is burying a date pit in a dream, it means that he will plant a lot of kindness, faith, and hope among people. See also: Interpretation of seeing an acrobat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream. It is worth noting that dates are among the foods that have many benefits mentioned in the Holy Qur’an. In the context of the hadith, seeing dates in a dream has many meanings, including good and evil, and this is due to psychology. About the dreamer and the situation he is in, and we remind you of the interpretation of the dream of dating in a dream, which is as follows: Scientists tend to interpret seeing dates in a dream as an indication to the dreamer that he will earn huge sums of money from a project and hear good news soon, God Almighty willing. It means seeing dates in general That you will earn money or hear good news or a good message soon. But if a man dreams that he is collecting dates in their own season, then this vision shows the dreamer that he will marry a wealthy, noble woman. But if a woman sees that she is eating ripe dates in a dream, then this vision shows She tells her that she will soon receive an inheritance - God willing - from her husband. On the other hand, we find that seeing eating fresh dates in a dream indicates that you are hearing good and kind words from a person dear to God, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. The interpretation of dreams for dating in a dream for a single woman varies. Interpretations of dreams from one person to another according to the situation in which you live, as we find in the interpretations that the interpretation of a divorced woman differs from the interpretation of a single woman and a pregnant woman, as explained by interpretation scholars, and what. Many of them agreed, and we present to you the interpretation of a dream about dating in a dream for a single woman, which is: This vision indicates her imminent marriage to a good man of good character.

title: Interpretation of cancer in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Cancer is a frightening and dangerous disease that controls the patient and is often debilitating and can rarely be treated because it is discovered late and at a late stage. Cancer in a dream of Al-AssamCervical cancer in a dream shows that the dreamer committing forbidden acts such as adultery, immorality, lying, and sin must think about what he is doing. Seeing liver cancer states that the dreamer He suffers from a serious illness that prevents him from performing his daily tasks and movements. A dream about getting cancer of the colon, stomach, or stomach is an indication of the psychological crisis that the viewer is going through due to hiding his feelings and pain, which causes him to enter a period of depression in light of not revealing his feelings. As for someone who dreams of getting cancer and it begins The treatment trip, this indicates that he is suffering from psychological and mental conflicts that he must get out of quickly. The meaning of seeing cancer for a single woman in a dream. An unmarried girl who dreams that she is sick. Cancer in a dream indicates that she is in good health and there is a possibility of becoming extremely ill. This is rare. The vision also shows that he is experiencing a psychological crisis due to leaving a relationship. Failed love, or shock for a friend or relative, or sadness over the loss of a loved one due to death. But if she sees a cancer patient in a dream, this indicates the presence of people close to her, but they lie about her in her absence. It may indicate that there is a calamity that will fall in love with her after someone conspires against her. Haters. If you notice that she has a lung disease, this indicates that she needs to exercise to improve her health. Or suggest that she lose some weight because obesity causes fatigue and illness. Dream of cancer in a dream about a married man. A married man who dreams of a cancer patient in a dream indicates that he will face Many conflicts affect his family life. As for his cancer, he seems to be in good health. The meaning of seeing cancer in a dream for a person: To see cancer in a dream means bachelorhood, problems, the controversy in which he lives. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

And if the visionary is a woman, married and has not yet given birth. This vision is an indication that her imminent desire will come true and that she will become pregnant in the near future, God willing. If the dreamer sees a smiling child in his dream, then he is facing a problem that will cause him sadness and sorrow in Reality. This is a sign that this problem is about to end. But if the dreamer sees a child crying in a dream, this is a sign that he will encounter crises and problems in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIn the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, seeing a child in a dream is a sign of... Positive changes that will occur in the dreamer's life. What if the person who dreams is suffering from problems and seizures in reality and sees a child in his dream. This is a sign that these problems will disappear soon and his social and economic situation will improve in the future. If the girl is engaged, then the vision indicates that her marriage is approaching without problems and complications, God willing. If this single girl is already suffering from psychological problems Seeing a child in a dream means the end of these problems and psychological discomfort, God willing. title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing crying in a dream?  What is the interpretation of crying over a burn in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing in a dream that she is cryingSome people are disturbed by the dream of crying in a dream for fear of the negative connotations it reflects, but its interpretation depends on the nature of the circumstances surrounding the dreamer in reality and the details of the dream. Seeing in a dream that she is cryingScholars believe that the interpretation of seeing crying in a dream varies between negative and positive connotations according to the dreamer's condition in the dream. Feeling sad and having a strong desire to cry without shedding tears in a dream expresses the dreamer's patience when facing problems and crises and calculates the suffering that he will encounter with a good reward with God. In a dark tunnel that he cannot passSeeing crying in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin confirms that seeing crying in a dream mostly reflects unwanted associations, especially if it is accompanied by sadness and screaming. As for if he sees that he is walking in a funeral and crying with people, let him contemplate the disappearance of his worries and the release of the distress that bothers him with a feeling of calm. Crying in prayer during a dream symbolizes the dreamer's intention to repent and return to God, but he has not yet taken a real step. As a result of increased thinking about what worries him. Confused and do not find an interpretation that reassures you? Search Google for online dream interpretation. Seeing crying in a dream for a single woman The interpretation of seeing her crying in a dream for an unmarried woman without screaming or tears foretells the approaching date of her wedding and the beginning of a new stable life in which she feels happy and satisfied, and sometimes it symbolizes the confusion and conflict in which she lives alone. Without finding a source of support and support in her important decisions and accompanying crying to slapping and screaming means that she does not take advantage of the opportunities that constantly retreat from achieving her goals or gaining the trust of those around her in her thinking. Seeing a married woman crying in a dream Seeing her crying in a dream for a married woman expresses her suffering from the pressures of life and the ongoing marital conflict, and crying over her husband indicates the financial distress he faces, which negatively affects the stability of the family. The dream warns the married woman of a bad relationship with her husband that may lead to her separation from him. As for if she sees that she is crying loudly and carrying the Qur’an in a dream, she is optimistic about the end of difficult circumstances and the beginning of a new stage of psychological stability, and crying in general in a dream can be a liberation from it. The burdens and responsibilities that fill the dreamer's life and exhaust him, are stored in his subconscious and appear in his dreams. Seeing crying in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman crying loudly in a dream indicates her psychological disturbance and fear of the fluctuations of pregnancy and the time of birth, and she only needs to calm down and reassure herself that everything will be fine. Or tears are a sign of the approaching birth and the final elimination of the pains of pregnancy. The most important interpretations of seeing crying in a dream Crying in a dream Crying bitterly in a dream indicates the crises that the divine is going through in reality and negatively controls his thinking and spirit, and uses it in adversity, while severe crying followed by laughter sometimes symbolizes the imminent death of the Lord. Crying over the dead in a dream Interpretation scholars have reached
